document.title: Upper Teeth Alignment with Clear Aligners
document.summary: Your treatment plan involves using clear aligners to gently align your upper teeth. This process is anticipated to take about 4–6 months. We'll primarily monitor your progress remotely, minimizing the need for frequent office visits. To help achieve the desired results, attachments will be used on some teeth. Additionally, your plan includes whitening to enhance your overall smile.
key_points: Clear aligners for upper teeth alignment
next_steps: Begin treatment with initial aligner fitting
Schedule remote monitoring sessions as needed
